text: wa-anzalna ilayka l-kitaba bil-haqi musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina l-kitabi wamuhayminan ʿalayhi fa-uh'kum baynahum bima anzala l-lahu wala tattabiʿ ahwaahum ʿamma jaaka mina l-haqi likullin jaʿalna minkum shir'ʿatan wamin'hajan walaw shaa l-lahu lajaʿalakum ummatan wahidatan walakin liyabluwakum fi ma atakum fa-is'tabiqu l-khayrati ila l-lahi marjiʿukum jamiʿan fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
